reviews.name: House Of Wax
reviews.reviewText: I like this movie. The actors they chose for it were good and made a good team together. Even though I have the dvd, if I see that it's on tv I will watch it. It's suspenseful and keeps on going until the end. And the ending was great.
reviews.title: Like this movie

reviews.name: House Of Wax
reviews.reviewText: This movie really keeps you at the edge of your seat! Really good movie!!!
reviews.title: Wow!

reviews.name: House Of Wax
reviews.reviewText: This was a good movie everybody like it and my sister loves this movie alot and when she goes to my room she want's to watch it
reviews.title: Great movie ever

reviews.name: House Of Wax
reviews.reviewText: I am a huge fan of old horror movies and decided to give this remake a shot. I was surprised by how much I liked it because remade movies usually don't stand a chance compared to the original! It was creepy, unnerving and it made me jump in a few spots. The price is great, the plot and acting is excellent. All in all, I recommend buying this movie. Even my teenage daughters like it!
reviews.title: A new take on horror
